name: ArmCord
description: ArmCord is a custom client designed to enhance your Discord experience while keeping everything lightweight.

scripts.start: npm run build && npm run copy-files && electron ./ts-out/main.js
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run copy-files && electron-builder
scripts.copy-files: copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.html src/**/*.css ts-out/ && copyfiles package.json ts-out/ && copyfiles assets/** ts-out/
